article_title: Too many women lack full access to affordable reproductive health care

article_metadata.description: By Rev. Kelli ClementVacationing in my Texas hometown last week, I helped my folks clean out a storage closet. We went through boxes of photos, old journals, markers of times gone by.

og.description: While abortion remains legal, far too many women have no access because of funding bans and other intrusive and medically unnecessary restrictions.
og.title: Too many women lack full access to affordable reproductive health care
